name: minify-code-using-terser
description: see minified terser output out of curiosity
author: Kostic Srecko

scripts.compare: yarn terser:default && yarn terser:mangle && yarn terser:mangle_and_compress
scripts.verify-minified-code-runs: node index.default.min.js && node index.mangle.min.js && node index.mangle_and_compress.min.js
